subject: Basketball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Sarunas Marciulionis, a star for Lithuania and a top N.B.A. player off the bench, was directly elected to the Basketball Hall of Fame by the international committee last week.
snippet: Sarunas Marciulionis, a star for Lithuania and a top N.B.A. player off the bench, was directly elected to the Basketball Hall of Fame by the international committee last week.
